hint.text: Point A and Point F signify room temperature and boiling point respectively.

solution.text:
The line segment joining point D and E is a horizontal line and the co-ordinates of point D and E are (3,_{l}_) and (4,_{l}_) respectively.
This shows the temperature was constant in the fourth minute at _{l}_ degrees celsius

content.text:
A=(0,_{m}_), B=(1,_{j}_), C=(2,_{k}_), D=(3,_{l}_), E=(4,_{l}_), F=(8,100)
Was the temperature constant for any duration? If yes, what was the constant temperature?
